Pre-Game Insights: Chicago Bulls (15-18, ninth in the Eastern Conference) vs. Washington Wizards (5-25, 15th in the Eastern Conference)
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Wizards average 12.2 made 3-pointers per game this season, 1.3 fewer makes per game than the Bulls give up (13.5). The Bulls average 16.5 made 3-pointers per game this season, 2.2 more made shots on average than the 14.3 per game the Wizards give up.
INJURIES: Wizards: Saddiq Bey: out (knee), Jordan Poole: day to day (hip), Carlton Carrington: day to day (head). Bulls: Zach LaVine: day to day (toe), Ayo Dosunmu: day to day (achilles).
